Frequently Asked Questions

Can I change my plan later?

Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. When upgrading, you'll be charged the prorated difference. When downgrading, you'll receive a credit for future payments.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.

Is there a student discount?

Yes! Students get 50% off all paid plans. Contact our support team with your valid student ID to get your discount code.
